description: for some reason its a norm to make terribly unsettling emoji and this doesnt do that
the only nice looking emoji font

Particularly because the shading is flat and being 2D flat shading really fit next to texts, unlike some other emojis with vertical gradient or even trying to look 3D. But I guess it's also the design of Twemoji that made it look great, I've seen the 3D recreation of Twemoji in form of 3D rendering of emoji balls and they look nice.
